titleStmt.title: The Duke of Monmouth and, Earl of Essex, with the rest of the noble peers, vindicated in answer to a printed Letter to a noble peer of the realm, about his late speech and petition to his Majesty.

notesStmt.note: Wing gives date 1680; date of Letter to a noble peer (1681) suggests that record was pub. in 1681.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
